title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: data related drying process faecal sludge collected different institutions relevant information feedstock experimental conditions. Experimental data categorized 8 groups: thermodynamics, kinetics, physiochemical properties, morphology, mechanical properties, dewaterability, disinfection, gas emission. Different types faecal samples involved generation data: - fresh faeces faecal sludge various types onsite sanitation facilities, among ventilated improved pit (VIP) latrines - urine diversion dry toilets (UDDT) - anaerobic baffled reactor (ABR) decentralized wastewater treatment plant (DEWAT) TODO: INSERT PICTURES? ## Installation can install development version dryingfaecal GitHub :

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: Experiment: Centrifugation done centrifuge HERMLE Z323, 120 minutes rate 5000 RPM, 40 g sample per centrifuge tube
